treatment.reference: Acidiplasma aeolicum gen. nov., sp. nov., a euryarchaeon of the family Ferroplasmaceae isolated from a hydrothermal pool, and transfer of Ferroplasma cupricumulans to Acidiplasma cupricumulans comb. nov. IJSEM 59:2815-2823
treatment.description: Morphology is as described for the genus; in addition, cells are often rod-like, with a tendency to form branched morphologies. The type strain is strain BH2T (=DSM 16551T =JCM 13668T).
